sentences.en: Kant lived his entire life in one city of East Prussia, called Konigsberg.
sentences.cn: 他住在一个康德的整个东普鲁士的城市生活，被称为柯尼斯堡。

sentences.en: Others of his orders mentioned that he was planning a great encirclement of Konigsberg, where he believed the primary German force to be located.
sentences.cn: 显然，他还认为德军的主力位于柯尼斯堡，正等着他去包围并消灭。

sentences.en: So he walked around the town and over the bridges of Konigsberg several times.
sentences.cn: 因此他走了在镇附近和在七桥梁多次.

trans.tran_cn: 哥尼斯堡（俄罗斯港市Kaliningrad的旧称）
